ca.corefacility.gview.data

Interface GenomeData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenomeDataImp

    public interface GenomeData
    Manages the data of the genome sequence.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean baseOnSequence(int base)
      Determines if the passed base is on the sequence.
      FeatureHolder getAllFeatures(FeatureHolderStyle holderStyle)
      Obtains a FeatureHolder from an associated FeatureHolderStyle.
      FeatureHolder getFeatures(FeatureFilter filter)
      Gives all features filtered out by the passed filter.

      FeatureHolder getOnlyFeatures(FeatureHolderStyle holderStyle)
      Obtains the set of all features which are styled according to the passed style.
      Sequence getSequence() 
      int getSequenceLength() 
      boolean isCircular()
      Determines if the sequence data is circular.
      boolean isXML() 

    • Method Detail

      • getSequenceLength

        int getSequenceLength()
        Returns:
        The length of the sequence.

      • getInitialBase

        int getInitialBase()
        Returns:
        The initial base of this sequence.

      • getAllFeatures

        FeatureHolder getAllFeatures(FeatureHolderStyle holderStyle)
        Obtains a FeatureHolder from an associated FeatureHolderStyle.
        Parameters:
        holderStyle - The style of the set of features we want to obtain.
        Returns:
        A feature holder containing the full set of features (including features styled by sub-styles).

      • getOnlyFeatures

        FeatureHolder getOnlyFeatures(FeatureHolderStyle holderStyle)
        Obtains the set of all features which are styled according to the passed style.
        Parameters:
        holderStyle - The style from which we want to get the features.
        Returns:
        A set of all the features styled by this style, minus any features styled by sub-styles.

      • getFeatures

        FeatureHolder getFeatures(FeatureFilter filter)
        Gives all features filtered out by the passed filter. Note: this performs a linear search of all features on the sequence.
        Parameters:
        filter -
        Returns:
        A FeatureHolder containing the specific features.

      • baseOnSequence

        boolean baseOnSequence(int base)
        Determines if the passed base is on the sequence.
        Parameters:
        base -
        Returns:
        True if the passed base is on the sequence, false otherwise.

      • getSequence

        Sequence getSequence()

      • isCircular

        boolean isCircular()
        Determines if the sequence data is circular.
        Returns:
        True if circular, false otherwise.

      • isXML

        boolean isXML()
        Returns:
        Whether or not the genomic data is derived from an XML file.
